tit.cmt: データベースでは、Tango Uocchi Kan と登録されていたのですが原文に従い tango は削除しました。

sen.j: 魚っ知館（うおっちかん）は京都府宮津市小田宿野にある水族館。
sen.e: Uocchi Kan is an aquarium located in Odashukuno, Miyazu City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Uocchi Kan is an aquarium located in Odashukuno, Miyazu City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Uocchi Kan is an aquarium located in Odashukuno, Miyazu City, Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 正式には「関西電力宮津エネルギー研究所 丹後魚っ知館」といい、関西電力のPR館として関西電力・宮津エネルギー研究所内にある。
sen.e: Uocchi kan is officially called `Miyazu Energy Research Center, Kansai Electric Power Co. Tango Uocchi Kan,' and it is an in-house PR hall of the Miyazu Energy Research Center, Kansai Electric Power Co..
Uocchi kan is officially called `Miyazu Energy Research Center, Kansai Electric Power Co. Tango Uocchi Kan,' and is an in-house PR hall of the Miyazu Energy Research Center, Kansai Electric Power Co.
Uocchi kan is officially called "Miyazu Energy Research Center, Kansai Electric Power Co. Tango Uocchi Kan", and is an in-house PR hall of the Miyazu Energy Research Center, Kansai Electric Power Co.

sen.j: 略称はエネケン。
sen.e: The abbreviated name of Uocchi Kan is Eneken.
The abbreviated name of Uocchi Kan is Eneken.
The abbreviated name of Uocchi Kan is Eneken.

sen.j: イメージキャラクターはミノカサゴをモチーフにしたウォッチ君。
sen.e: The poster child of Uocchi kan is Mr. Uocchi created from the image of lionfish.
The poster child of Uocchi kan is Mr. Uocchi, created from the image of a lionfish.
The poster child of Uocchi Kan is Mr. Uocchi, created from the image of a lionfish.

sen.j: 現在、魚の漢字を使ったカルタ「魚魚（とと）あわせ」が有名。
sen.e: Nowadays, it is well known for Japanese play cards, `Totoawase' using Chinese characters of fish.
Nowadays, Uocchi kan is well known for Japanese playing cards, `Totoawase' using Chinese characters of fish.
Nowadays, Uocchi Kan is well known for Japanese playing cards, `Totoawase' using Chinese characters of fish.

sen.j: 水族館
有料。
宮津周辺に生息している魚が見られる。
sen.e: Fishes that live around Miyazu City are seen.
Fishes that live around Miyazu City are seen.
Fishes that live around Miyazu City are seen.

sen.j: タッチングプール
無料。
公式ホームページには「日本一大きい」と表記されている。
sen.e: In its official Home page, it is indicated `Uocchi Kan is the largest aquarium in Japan.'
Its official Home page states that `Uocchi Kan is the largest aquarium in Japan.'
Its official Home page states that "Uocchi Kan is the largest aquarium in Japan".

sen.j: エネルギー展示室
無料。
エネルギーの勉強ができる。
魚っ知コーナー
無料。
地域の特産品を紹介している。
最寄の鉄道駅
北近畿タンゴ鉄道宮津線栗田駅（駅からタクシー約20分）
sen.e: Kitakinki Tango Railway Corporation (KTR) Kitakinki Tango Railway Corporation (KTR) Miyazu Line Kunda Station (about twenty minutes taxy ride from the station)
sen.cmt: 北近畿タンゴ鉄道北近畿タンゴ鉄道→重複していますが現状のまま訳しています。
sen.e: Kitakinki Tango Railway Corporation (KTR) Kitakinki Tango Railway Corporation (KTR) Miyazu Line Kunda Station (about twenty minute taxi ride from the station)
Kitakinki Tango Railway Corporation (KTR) Miyazu Line Kunda Station (about twenty minute taxi ride from the station)
sen.cmt: 重複については間違いを確認し、オリジナル部分共に重複部分を削除しました。

sen.j: 最寄のインターチェンジ
京都縦貫自動車道宮津天橋立インターチェンジ（IC下車後車で約20分）
sen.e: Kitakinki Tango Railway Kitakinki Tango Railway Miyazu Amanohashidate Interchange exit (about twenty minutes car ride from the interchange exit)
sen.cmt: 北近畿タンゴ鉄道北近畿タンゴ鉄道→重複していますが現状のまま訳しています。
sen.e: Kitakinki Tango Railway Kitakinki Tango Railway Miyazu Amanohashidate Interchange exit (about twenty minute car ride from the interchange exit)
Kyoto Jukan Expressway Miyazu-Amanohashidate Interchange (about twenty minute car ride from the interchange exit)
sen.cmt: 訳が抜けていましたので、原文より訳を挿入しました。

sen.j: 舞鶴若狭自動車道舞鶴西インターチェンジ－国道27号－国道178号（IC下車後車で約40分）
sen.e: Maizuru wakasa Expressway Maizuru-Nishi Interchange exit - Route 27 - Route 178 (about forty minutes car ride from the interchange exit)
Maizuru wakasa Expressway Maizuru-Nishi Interchange exit - Route 27 - Route 178 (about forty minute car ride from the interchange exit)
Maizuru Wakasa Expressway Maizuru-Nishi Interchange exit - Route 27 - Route 178 (about forty minute car ride from the interchange exit)

sen.j: 京都府宮津市小田宿野1001
休館日 ： 毎週木曜日（祝祭日の場合は翌日）、年末年始（12月29日～1月3日）
sen.e: Closed days: every Thursday (on the following day if it falls on public holidays), the year-end and New Year holidays (Dec 29-January 3)
Closed days: every Thursday (on the following day if it falls on a public holiday), the year-end and New Year holidays (Dec 29-January 3)
Closed days: every Thursday (on the following day if it falls on a public holiday), the year-end and New Year holidays (Dec 29-January 3)
